product_name: Black Diamond Rambla Insulated Gloves - 2013 Closeout
long_description: An under-the-cuff version of the Super Rambla, Black Diamond Rambla Gloves are streamlined, midweight ski gloves that provide incredible dexterity and protection from the elements. 100% waterproof and breathable GORE-TEX(R) inserts with XCR product technology are guaranteed to keep your hands dry. Woven nylon shells have 4-way stretch for comfort and great dexterity. 142g PrimaLoft(R) One insulation and fixed 100g fleece lining keep your hands warm. Goat leather palms and fingers offer good grip. 3D patterning allows for maximum dexterity. Black Diamond Rambla Insulated Gloves have short cuffs with rip-and-stick closures. Closeout.
short_description: An under-the-cuff version of the Super Rambla, Black Diamond Rambla Gloves are streamlined, midweight ski gloves that provide incredible dexterity and protection from the elements.
